attributes.action: Pause the brexit process, and urgently call a general election.
attributes.additional_details: 27th of March. Parliament decided to delay leaving the EU to the 12th of April but nothing else. It has already rejected no deal, the current deal, and 8 other options. The commons needs to reflect the people to get a deal and right now it doesn't.
attributes.background: The failure of parliament to decide the future of the withdrawal agreement shows that it's more than the government that cannot get a deal, parliament cannot agree. A new general election with new MPs is needed to break the deadlock and provide a new way forward to deliver the will of the people.
